Package jaca.android.tools

Class Summary
AccelerometerSensorManager Artifact for managing an Android accelerometer sensor
AllSensorsManager Artifact for managing the three most common Android sensors in a whole: accelerometer sensor, geomagnetic sensor, orientation sensor
BatteryArtifact Artifact that provides information about the device battery.
CalendarManager Artifact for managing the built-in google calendar.
CallManager Artifact enabling agents to monitoring incoming call and call state

Require the permission android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE
#### Observable Properties ##### call_state(State).
ConnectivityManager Artifact that manages every kind of connectivity available on the device.
ContactsManager Artifact that manages the device contacts
GeomagneticSensorManager Artifact for managing an Android geomagnetic sensor
GPSManager Artifact used for managing the GPS of the device

Requires either of the permissions android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION or android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.
MySensorsArtifact  
NotificationManager Artifac usable to notify the user of events that happen.
ObjectWrapperArtifact An artifat that wraps an object with a given interface.
OrientationSensorManager Artifact for managing an Android orientation sensor
PhoneSettingsManager Artifact that provides access to volume and ringer mode control
#### Observable Properties ##### {@code ringer_mode(Mode).
ServiceArtifact Artifact that allow to interact with an existing Android Service that response at the specified action and map its interface into artifact operations.
SMSManager Artifat used for managing SMS messages (send, receive sms messages and monitoring if sms message is successfully sent, or failed).
